title: Ann Rule - Every Breath You Take
description:
Every Breath You Take
Ann Rule

Sheila Blackthorne Bellush lived a seemingly perfect life until one unforgettable day tragedy struck. In the aftermath of her death, what unfolds is series of shocking events that leads straight to her ex-husband, multimillionaire Allen Blackthorne. Following a trail of deception from Oregon and Hawaii to Texas and Florida, Ann Rule gained complete access to Sheila's family, friends, and neighbors, as well as to the detectives and prosecutors on the case. With "Every Breath You Take", Ann Rule has written a heart-pounding account of obsession, revenge, and murder.

Ann Rule is the author of nineteen. New York TImes bestsellers. A former Seattle police officer, she lectures frequently to law enforcement, prosecutors, and forensic science organizations, including the FBI. She has testified before U.S. Senate Judiciary subcommittees on victims' rights, and was a civilian adviser to the VI-CAP (Violent Criminal Apprehension Program) Task Force that set up a computer program to track and trap serial killers. Ann Rule lives near Seattle, Washington.

From 5 CDs in MP3 format 
Read by Blair Brown
